chunk:
VIKA’S ESSENTIALS ROSA DEW FOR REJUVENATING EYE AREA

Brand: Vika's Essentials

Category: Around Eye Cream
book: 2464-VIKA’S ESSENTIALS ROSA DEW FOR REJUVENATING EYE AREA

chunk: Ingredients: Sweet Almond Oil (Prunus amygdalus dulcis)*, Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia chinensis)*, Evening Primrose Oil (Oenothera biennis)*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rose Otto Oil (Rosa damascena)*, Lavender Oil (Lavandula angustifolia)*, Fennel Seed Oil (Foeniculum vulgare)*, Matricaria recutita Oil, Carrot Seed Oil (Daucus carota)*
book: 2464-VIKA’S ESSENTIALS ROSA DEW FOR REJUVENATING EYE AREA

chunk:
Directions: Apply 1 drop under each eye as needed.

Warnings: Store in a cool dry place, use within 6 months.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
book: 2464-VIKA’S ESSENTIALS ROSA DEW FOR REJUVENATING EYE AREA
